#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

const int MAXN=1123456;

char s[MAXN],solv[MAXN];

int n,k,freq[MAXN][3];


int main(){
	scanf("%d%d", &n, &k);
	scanf(" %s", s);
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		if(s[i]=='a') freq[i%k][0]++;
		if(s[i]=='b') freq[i%k][1]++;
		if(s[i]=='c') freq[i%k][2]++;
	}
	for(int i=0;i<k;i++){
		int a=freq[i][0],b=freq[i][1],c=freq[i][2];
		if(a>=b){
			if(a>=c) solv[i]='a';
			else if(c>a) solv[i]='c';
		}
		if(b>a){
			if(b>=c) solv[i]='b';
			else if(c>b) solv[i]='c';
		}
	}
	printf("%s\n", solv);
	return 0;
}
